ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] One hour to vote!
ygData.msgSnippet: This says one hour to vote but since I have no idea what time you wrote this... (yes, I know, look at the time on my email... but that requires work, hehe) I
ygData.messageBody:
This says "one hour to vote" but since I have no idea
what time you wrote this... (yes, I know, look at the
time on my email... but that requires work, hehe)

I wish you'd stay. I've always enjoyed your posts.
Even though I don't post much myself, hehe.


--- Kent King <propellerheadus@...> wrote:
> If you guys think I suck, then say "yes you suck".
> If
> you'd like for me to stay in this community then
> reply
> "no please don't go".
>
> I've played everquest since 4/1/99, and I know a
> little about playing monks since I've had one as my
> main the whole time.
>
> Up to you.
>
> Hello,
>
> We have received a request from you to unsubscribe
> from the
> EverQuest group. Please confirm your request by
> replying to this message. If you do not wish to
> unsubscribe from
> EverQuest, please ignore this message.
>
> Regards,
>
> Yahoo! Groups Customer Care
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
>
